website_summaries.verdict: A well-received, hypoallergenic solution for those who want a top-quality comforter.
pros: Retains loft after a machine wash
cons: Larger dimensions may prove difficult for home washing machines

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, but I'm fantastically disappointed in this item. When I first received it, I loved it, but as time has gone on the baffles have mysteriously emptied and the duvet has lost a good portion of the filling. I have taken great care of the item, and as such see no reason for the filling to have disappeared. I'm contacting amazon in hopes for a replacement, but I'm not sure what the warranty is on an item like this. I've only had the item since Mid February 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Hcl10

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have had this comforter for little more than a year. It has corner tabs to attach to a duvet cover. It is a nice large size. It keeps us warm at night during both cold winter months. However, I have to agree with some of the negative criticisms. The individual baffles lose filling. Some get more filling. I haven't noticed any filling come out but the baffles are clearly not constructed well. It starts to get lumpy and uncomfortable after washing it. Time to find something new.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: Either mines defective or it's just not breathable at all. I put a 100% cotton duvet on it (so shouldn't hinder breathability), but it was way too hot. It's currently winter and even with the cooler weather this is way too hot. We've tried it for a week thinking maybe it's just us and needed to adjust to it, but if anything it's getting worse. We end up taking the covers off constantly, then getting too cold and putting them back on, then being too hot about 15 minutes later. Not good for sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over 6 months and it has held up well. My one complaint is that some of the squares are empty now. When I first got this, I was very excited to try it out based on so many positive reviews. I keep it with a duvet cover, and every time I take the cover off for washing, a lot of the filling is coming out, hence the empty pockets. Still using for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations! It is so soft and luxurious and although it's down alternative it's so fluffy! I was a little tentative about purchasing it based on other reviews saying it made too much noise or that it would be too hot, but it's perfect for me. It's not too hot and it's not noisy at all. It's not over-sized, but covers my Cal-Kind sufficiently. I'm very happy with it and would buy it again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this insert. It is soft and luxurious and quite warm. After reading all of the reviews I Purchased this to use on our bed now, in August. I live in California. I found this insert to be too warm for this time of year and two heavy but we packed it up to use in the fall. It will be perfect then and I like the fact that it’s Cotton and breathable. I only wish it was easier to find a duvet cover in this size.
customer_reviews.author: wildhare0223

customer_reviews.title: Down alternative filling gathers into balls, travels between quilted squares leaving some empty
customer_reviews.text: This down alternative comforter has utterly failed after 5 years. The filling has rolled itself into balls without any washing, normal use and left other quilted panels totally empty. After a while it is like sleeping under a pile of lumpy stuffed animals with cold air rushing in between.
customer_reviews.author: mosslake

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this bedspread
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bedspread! I ordered one a few years ago and sadly the material inside got to the point where it was too weak and ripped...this was from me bleaching it clean and white one too many times and bad materials. It's heavy and does fantastic with our cold winter nights. The comforter is soft at relaxed at arrival unlike many comforters that require many washing to relax well on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of lumpy beds. It looks more like a disease. Incredibly heavy - not even close for an all season comforter and that is coming from a girl who is always cold. Very disappointed trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: ozyboyz

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase, first lasted 8 years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best comforter and a great value. We purchased on back in 2011 and the stuffy just finally started getting clumpy. We tried another comforter that was just a bit cheaper with higher reviews and hated it, then went and ordered this one right away and are back in love. These are great Duvets!
customer_reviews.author: Just an Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this duvet insert. It's the perfect weight! I posted a picture of it with and without a duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. It fluffed up beautifully right out of the box. I bought a king size and it measures bigger then many of the king comforters I looked at. So, with two people under it, no one is getting cold. It's not too heavy or too light but definitely warm!! It seems very well made. Yes, it has lint on it as you'll read in other reviews. It's no big deal to get off with a lint roller or vacuum attachment. I highly recommend this comforter! It feels as good as down with no special cleaning or feathers sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: The Biker Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter with a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft thick & smooth comforter! I ordered the oversized king. First one had torn (upon opening?) so I had to return it, but the replacement (which is not damaged) arrived within 2 days! Great shipping and very easy to return with Amazon. I would treat it more delicately than how heavy it feels/seems though- in handling and washing- especially the king sizes which are super large and hard to manage especially if you are petite like me! Great fit on bed though- perfect for tossers & turners- nothing ever left out in the cold. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieF

customer_reviews.title: Light/fluffy but keeps your body cool & warm. Fluff stays intact.
customer_reviews.text: I had mine for 3 years before the fluff inside started to move around. I loved how fluffy/light it was but still kept me warm. I sweat in my sleep so I didn't want the warmth to be "locked-in". This comforter stays cool and is breathable without making you sweat more. If curious, I got a green bamboo duvet cover that was silky and it was a perfect match. Only advice, if you have a queen get a king-size if you like that over-sized look. It covered mine perfectly but too perfect, I wanted it to hang a little more.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter but very hot.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very comfy however, it is so hot. I wake up sweating in the middle of the night. I was expecting something that was able to be used year round and this will definitely not be happening. The overall quality is great. I am only giving 3 stars because it's so thick that it is uncomfortable to sleep with. When it arrived it was also missing one of the loops to tie the duvet to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a comfoter that fits our bed!
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter! We have been looking for an over-sized king for a while now. We paired it with the. Usually the comforters are just a tad smaller than the duvet covers and that makes me crazy. This Duvet cover was huge so we REALLY had a lot of extra room. Finding this over-sized comforter made it perfect. We have a Cal King bed and now our comforter is long enough and wide enough so that we don't see the sheets beneath it. It is a little warm for the summer, but it is definitely a three season weight. Well made and very fluffy. I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mjobent

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this comforter! I was a bit hesitant to order a comforter on Amazon without seeing it in person first, so I did a lot of research and read many reviews before I made my decision. I use this as a comforter and not a duvet insert. It is great quality and warm also. The entire comforter is edged with a silver/grey threading which adds a nice look. And I love the lines on the comforter because it adds some depth. It is also warm but not too hot. I live in the south but was able to use it during summer months. Now that it's getting colder I am still able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jmick

customer_reviews.title: Solid comforter
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an 8yo down comforter that was shedding feathers and causing my allergies to flare up. Sold on the positive reviews. This insert is cozy but not as fluffy as other alternative down comforters I've used. I live in MA and for me it's the perfect, all-season weight. No "wow" factor; just a solid comforter and a good value for the price. Haven't washed yet so not sure how it will hold up, but seems well-made; no shifting of fill yet. I purchased the king-size for my queen bed and it fits perfectly (I recommend if you have a queen and sleep next to a blanket thief).
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comforter (very fluffy)
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this comforter super affordable, its great quality too. I have been looking for a comforter like this for a while, but ones in stores are too expensive and don't compare. It gives the bed a lot of fluff and has nice weight to it, but isnt too warm (I'm using it in summer and its perfect). It arrived super quick; i chose regular shipping, and it came in 2 days. I was hesitant to buy a comforter online, but this one is PERFECT! I ordered the queen for my full beause it was cheaper and because i prefer bigger blankets and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rineer

customer_reviews.title: Decent comforter but lacks filling
customer_reviews.text: The comforter has some weight to it, which I like, and is pretty soft, but lacks some of the fluffy volume I was expecting. The one that I received is pretty flat and lifeless compared to how it appears in the pictures--it just doesn't have the volume of fill inside that would make it great to wrap up in (vs. just covering me in bed). In my mind, there isn't anything exceptional about this one--it's about average. Maybe I've just had very nice ones in the past and consequently have higher expectations?
customer_reviews.author: Chris O.

customer_reviews.title: Warmer than you'd expect for not to be down
customer_reviews.text: This is a cozy alternative to down! Little built-in starps in the corners to tie it into a duvet cover (Too bad duvet cover designers haven't as much forethought). It's not heavy but has the fluff and inviting feel of real down without getting poked with feather parts...and the warmth..still there :) It's washed quite well in the bedding cycle on my front loader, just don't overdo it on the detergent. This was a replacement to a "queen" size real down I had previously that looked more like a miniskirt on an elephant - the size on this one is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: cyanidesweetcake

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous comforter, especially for the price. I ordered this as well as a goose down comforter that was twice the cost. Tried them both and opted to keep this one. Just as warm and fluffy and I can wash it in my machine. I ordered the oversize king for my king bed and the sizing is perfect to use as a bedspread. I'm using it inside a duvet cover and it hangs over the edges of the bed enough to look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cox

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler as I transitioned her out of the crib. I wanted something that I could wash in case of an accident (haven't had to do that yet so I can't comment on how it holds up in the wash). However, it is a perfect weight and super cozy. I'm even considering getting one for my room.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!  See update.
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is extremely comfortable. We also purchased two covers for it. Duvets are a new experience for us. We had comforters or bed spreads for years. Upon visiting some friends up north we thought this is something we should try. We recommend it. Update 1/14: This was great for about nine months. Then the filling moved around & bunched up. Some spots had no filling between the cover, offering no warmth. I deleted 2 stars. Bed spreads and comforters lasted for years. Now we must buy another duvet to go with or duvet covers or go back to buying bed spreads. Very disappointed. We are replacing this with one from Prison.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good purchase. I wanted to try a down comforter without making the large investment in a real version. I purchased this down alternative comforter last year and we now use it every winter for added warmth. It was too thick/heavy for summer, but it reduces the need to turn the temp up in the winter. It was a good value purchase. I do not intend to upgrade to real anymore because this comforter works just fine. I purchased a duvet for it and place it under my decorative comforter. At night, we pull back the decorative comforter and sleep with the duvet/down alternative (very cozy)
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: Amaaaazing
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in yesterday ! And oh my goodness it is the best for the price , I’ve been on the hunt for a down alternative comforter for a while and all the ones I’ve seen seem so cheap or they have fake pictures of them and in reality they’re sheer and thin . This one is exactly like the picture entails . Buy buy buy , you won’t be dissapointed . Just be smart when washing it , the tag gives specific instructions
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comforter. I was on the search for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comforter. I was on the search for the perfect one for over a year because a cal king comforter is way pricey. I wanted one that was heavy and fresh but also kept me warm during cold months and one that was extremely soft but not too fluffy. And of course not real down because alternative down is cruelty free and less maintenance. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter! I don't know why I waited so long to try one. The price was just right, had to pay twice as much for the duvet cover! The medium weight seems to be perfect and very warm. Even turned our thermostat down to 62 at night. I do have a blanket with it as well, our bedroom is very chilly! We shall see how it is during summer with just a sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: This is super nice! Suck it, "down snobs"!
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest... Down sucks. It's hot, it's clumpy, it's pointy and it's overpriced. This is a medium weight down ALTERNATIVE that is fantastically soft, machine washable, easily fluffed in the dryer and priced right! There are some "down snobs" that have panned this, and I guess if I was overly pretentious I would, too, but this is a great product and would still be a great product if the price were higher. Again, it's medium weight, which means that it's warm but not Arctic ready. Shipping was fast, packing was good... I would (and probably will) buy a product from this manufacturer again!
customer_reviews.author: Andy668

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this comforter after reading all the positive reviews here and am very pleased with my purchase. I ordered the oversized King comforter which is perfect for my California King sized bed. This comforter is lightweight, yet it is still very warm. It is very well made, and worth way more than what I paid for it here on Amazon.com. A word of advice to those who are contemplating the oversized King version - the oversized King version is very large and I had a hard time getting it to fit into my front loader washing machine. It would probably be a good idea to take this item to a laundromat where they have heavy duty washer and dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Girl

customer_reviews.title: I will say that is very thick and heavy so I wouldn't recommend using it during the warmer months unless your home ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a California King and this fit it well. I would prefer a couple more inches on each side but it still did the job. I was impressed with the quality of the comforter and I use it alone or with the Divatex Grace Microfiber Duvet set and the Elegant Comfort 1800 Thread Count Duvet Set. It fit well in both duvet sets. I will say that is very thick and heavy so I wouldn't recommend using it during the warmer months unless your home is cold. I use it during the winter months and stay very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barkley

customer_reviews.title: warm warm warm!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is warm! When we first got it, we weren't expecting it to be as warm as it was. As an unexpected bonus, we were able to turn down our thermostat during winter and the savings from that alone have paid for this product. Nice, 'eh? It's warm, soft, durable, and most importantly, comfortable. It can be squeezed into a relatively small size when packing away for the summer, which is great because we don't really have much storage space available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because other comparable comforters were super expensive. We have used this for a few weeks now and I LOVE it! It has been both hot and cold in the evening (literally 80 one night and 50 the next...our house does not have central air....or AC in general and heat is expensive where we live). On the warm night I was heavily snuggled under this and did not get hot and on the cold night I did not get cold. Even my husband said the same thing, we're going to be buying one for each bed in our house!!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Internal filling comes out! Creates a mess in the bedroom and the washer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this early this year. Use it with a duvet cover. Initially I really liked the comforter. It's warm and fluffy, really good. However if you wash the duvets and take the comforter out of the duvets you will see that a lot of the internal stuff came out of the comforter and creates a big mess. It's hard to clean all those little things from the duvets before washing. It's a mess. I got another comforter now which keeps the stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Heerlein

customer_reviews.title: Best ever in size and quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a really great filler for my duvet. It is so hard to find a filler large enough to really fill a king size Duvet propally most of them come up way smaller than the Duvet it self. Has far as warmth I find no difference than an actual down filled comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Gram3

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (who is ALWAYS cold!) asked for a new duvet insert to replace the down one I purchased for her when she went to college seven years ago. I was concerned about the regular queen size completely covering her bed but she insisted that was what she wanted, so that is what I ordered. It turns out (not for the first time) that she was correct and the standard queen size fits her bed and her duvet perfectly. She told me that is was light AND warm. She is very happy. If I ever need one for myself, I will order this one.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Janek

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is the ultimate in luxury, especially for the price. I've spent far more on duvets that were no more superior than this one (many even less so), therefore I am extremely happy that I made this purchase. The oversized queen duvet fits my regular sized queen bed perfectly - it is a bit snug in the regular queen sized duvet cover, but merely by a few inches. It will surely flatten out over time (as they all seem to.) This may be the best value I've received from an online purchase in a long time - don't hesitate to try this duvet out.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good comforter
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and quality of this comforter. My only complaint is its a little warmer than I thought it would be. My husband wakes up sweaty in the morning now. We do have the heat set on 69 now because of a little one in our home, so I bet if we had the temperature go down at night like we used to, the weight of the blanket would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my comforter. It is high quality. I am use to sleeping with atleast 5 blankets on top of me so I definitely like to be very warm. I am now down to just a heating blanket (not on) and this comforter and I am still just as warm as I am use to being. It is not heavy like my 5 blankets, but it is very warm. Love it. I bought the king size for my queen bed. It is just the right size. Dont have to worry about my husband stealing the blanket in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and warm
customer_reviews.text: Luxuriously fluffy and soft! I've had to put it away until fall/winter, though, as it is too hot and ordered a thinner duvet insert in the meantime. No bad smells, no defects at all. Great duvet- just a little too warm for southern summer.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaCollar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comforter
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter. Easily washed and dried. Doesn't form lumps thanks to individually filled pockets. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Maren Thompson

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE 3 years later....
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with the item. I've had it for about a month and it is still full, fluffy and comfortable. I only have one problem. It sheds a little. It was a little disappointing but it wasn't difficult to clean up. I just hope it doesn't get worse later. As long as you have a duvet cover, you should be fine. Overall, I'm happy with the item. Update: 8/23/2014: We still have it! We wash it occasionally with out the duvet cover and throw in a tennis ball. Although some of the fluff has shifted slightly and it's kinda flat but it's still in decent usable shape and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, affordable, durable!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! 2 years later this comforter still looks and feels great! Back to buy another one for a different room! You won’t be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: It's a fine comforter but it doesn't hold up well sadly
customer_reviews.text: The comforter has worked well for a few months but somehow the filling is starting to either come out or deteriorate. It's a fine comforter but it doesn't hold up well sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but hot
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is indeed luxuriously soft and comfortable. Based on reviews, I ordered the oversized king and it is perfect for our standard king bed and king duvet cover. Unfortunately for us in our temperate south bay climate, it is crazy hot. The nighttime temperature of our home dips into the mid-60s at night, and I often wake in desperate need of a cool-down. Despite this inconvenience, I keep this duvet on our bed; It is fabulously comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K Ford

customer_reviews.title: It is probably the most comfortable and soft piece of bedding in our home
customer_reviews.text: Our family LOVES this blanket. It is probably the most comfortable and soft piece of bedding in our home. It has the feeling of down but without the pokey little feathers. It also comes with the little strap pieces on the corners to fasten into a duvet, and they work perfectly. It went through the wash with no problems and is heavy enough to use alone on winter nights. I am planning on purchasing another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this comforter. Have 2 rough-housing dogs, this new blanket is replacing a $250 royal velvet down comforter bought on amazon that was far too delicate and would constantly rip at the seams from being stepped on by them, even with 2 additional duvet covers on it. It ended with duct tape all over it, what a piece of junk and complete waste of money. This one appears much more sturdy after 30 days of wear and tear, and is nice and warm probalby down to 40 degrees, but we'll see on that. EDIT: Still using this after a year, still in great shape. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The best $80.89 I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Do not spend hundreds of dollars when you don't have to. This down alternative comforter delivers. Prepare to sleep naked in the winter in the midwest; well, not quite.... I can only hope I can say the same in the summer heat here in Oklahoma and that this comforter will be comfy with the AC turned way "down." Unsurpassed quality. If only now I could find a duvet cover in oversize king that I can put this baby in to protect. Oversize king products are is not easily found
customer_reviews.author: ZoomM3

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly plush and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Some people reviewed this product as being too thin, others thought it was too hot and not an all-season comforter. I was preparing myself for a possibly 'too thin' comforter...it is not thin, its very plush, especially for an all season comforter. Also, I keep my house around 66 or 67 degrees and this comforter is amazing...so comfortable and luxurious. I couldn't be pleased more. My family was over for Christmas and they all were very impressed with damask material and the overall plush look. You can't go wrong with this item, especially given its price!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Josselyn III

customer_reviews.title: Great quality duvet insert for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around quite a bit for a decent duvet insert that didn't cost me a fortune. I used to have actual down and, although I liked it, I was sick of the "shedding" of feathers. This is a great alternative. We live in a warm climate and I don't find that it's too hot - just the perfect amount of "warmth" and almost seems to "know" the temperature outside to provide heat/cooling. I haven't had to launder it yet, so we will see how that goes, but the squares seem to be sewn well enough that we won't have to worry about wandering filling.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too hot.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this duvet was absolutely fine, probably a little better than I anticipated BUT the weight of the duvet was not, it is so much warmer than I was lead to believe - we live in Northern IL and we are uncomfortably hot with it and it is January. When I buy a 4 season duvet I do not expect this, I am going to try and return it. If you get cold at night I am sure it would be a brilliant buy but it is certainly not the duvet for us.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly, and was quite a surprise. I have never purchased a down alternative and wasn't sure I'd be happy with the result. The material was soft and silky and the "down" felt like the highest quality down I had ever come across. I was extremely happy I gave it a shot. Also, though this says it's "all season" this comforter is VERY warm. Come late spring and summer, we will definitely have to find something else, or we'll be baked in bed. For the colder nights this comforter is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One year later it is all lumpy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the comforter at first. The size was wonderful. However, one year later all the down has clumped up and some areas of the comforter have no down now. This makes the blanket cold in areas and hard to sleep with the lumps, not to mention when the bed is made all the clumps make it look horrible. Time to find a new blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rodvold

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very soft and fluffy! It fits inside my king duvet well. My only complaint is that it only has 4 corner loops to tie the duvet to. My last one had 6. 4 on the corners and 2 in the middle (one at the foot and one at the head). I’d purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Grant

customer_reviews.title: She is in frail health and needed a lightweight but warm cover that she could easily adjust during the night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She is in frail health and needed a lightweight but warm cover that she could easily adjust during the night. Both needs are met. After a month it seems to be holding its shape. The squared~off stitching is keeping the fill in place. No smells emanating from the material. Soft and comfy. Yes I also bought a duvet cover. Haven't washed it so can't report on the that. If you are look looking for a decent duvet at an affordable price, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Just as described and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I didn't notice any "fuzz" as several reviewers have mentioned. But even if I had, this is clearly stated as a "duvet insert", meaning it is intended on being inside a cover, not used alone. So who cares if there is fuzz? It is oversized and has much more coverage than your typical duvet (which usually barely covers the mattress). It is a little heavy for summer but I think it will be perfect in the winter. It is very soft and fluffy, but not too fluffy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DesertRat

customer_reviews.title: very luxurious comforter
customer_reviews.text: Previously we had a wool comforter as my husband is allergic to down. We bought this one to replace it. It is just as warm and cozy but much lighter on your body. I love it. I'm not sure yet how it will be in the summer months when it's hot outside. But so far so good. It was delivered fast and in great condition. Also looks fluffy and beautiful on the bed. Have not seen a better deal for the money. It is very reasonably priced for the quality. We have a Cal King bed and it is true to size. I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these comfortors before me daughter went to college and she loved it and so did I. I ended up purchasing 2 more for our home. My husband and I both overslept we were so comfortable the first night we used. It is the perfect balance of weight and fluffiness for every season. I have owned feather down comforters (no more because of allergies) and if I were to put this purchase against the feather down comforter I would choose the down alternative that I have purchased. Very very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: The comforter is warm without being too heavy and breathable (which is good, as I sleep VERY warm)
customer_reviews.text: I debated between purchasing a down or down alternative comforter for a few weeks, and finally went with this down-alternative option because of the price and the reviews. I definitely made the right choice! The comforter is warm without being too heavy and breathable (which is good, as I sleep VERY warm), I've put it inside a cotton duvet cover, and the look is exactly as I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: tierneymarie

customer_reviews.title: BEST INSERT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: As a student looking for a fair priced comforter meanwhile getting my moneys worth.. THIS WAS IT. not only it has the perfect amount of fill to keep warm (I happen to be cold ALL THE TIME) but also remains cool so it doesnt get too hot. I use to use the regular "bed-in-a-bag" and ended up having to buy extra blankets to use under to keep me warm but with this comforter I dont even use blankets! I simply use only this along with a duvet cover and its set! one step process in the morning to just make my bed! pull the cover over!
customer_reviews.author: jmej88

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter ever
customer_reviews.text: We've had many comforters over the years and this is hands down the best one. And it is better than far more expensive ones we've owned. It's been six months and is just as good as when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Fits Pottery Barn Duvet cover. Usually, California Kings duvets don't seem to fill the Pottery Barn duvet covers. this is the only one i have ever found that really fills it up to all the corners. It is a ridiculously low price for basically the exact same quality as the RH or PB duvet. I've purchased this now a second time for another bed. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erine EE

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, microfiber filling is falling out in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved the duvet, it was as soft and as comfortable as a high quality down duvet; however, in less than a month, so much of the microfiber filling has come out that in several places it's just fabric with no filling for warmth (I took a pic but it's hard to see it). Not only that but the microfiber filling is so fine that it has gotten everywhere and I can't get it off of the rest of my bedding no matter how much I wash it; I'm pretty sure I've inhaled a bunch of while sleeping too so that's probably not great for my lungs..
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Warm in winter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable in the cold winter! My spouse was always too cold in the winter until we got this- she loves it. Seems to be built really well. We put a cover on it and it doesn't quite fit properly because this is oversized, but we just fold over part of it and she gets to sleep with that on her side. Still holds up two years later so quality seems to be great!
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Just got my comforter, oversize king was the right option for my bed and duvet. I like the fluffiness and like people say, it is very warm and that's what I was looking for since it is for the winter (I change for a light blanket during summer). The cover material is not that noisy as the one I had before from Bed Bath and Beyond that even after washing it for years never lost its noisy and crispy touch. I am pleased with my buy and hope this comforter will last years of use.
customer_reviews.author: MagdaleneMaria

customer_reviews.title: love this comforter
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to a king size bed and needed a new comforter. I loved the old down comforter we had, but didn't like what I had come to learn of the down industry (live plucking) so I wanted a down alternative. This feels like exactly the same weight and thickness as the old down comforter and is much less expensive. We got the extra long king (took other reviewers advice) and it fits perfectly in our regular king duvet cover. A fantastic comforter at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This comforter keeps you warm in winter and cool in summer
customer_reviews.text: This comforter keeps you warm in winter and cool in summer. I have it in a duvet cover, but it is simple fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Karmegi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet insert is awesome. It is of wonderful quality in the material and the design. It is so soft, has a nice binding all around it and although not mentioned in the product description, I was happy to find also had stitched in loops on each corner to easily attach to the duvet cover. Many I found did not have these. This was an absolute awesome price especially for the high quality! Many I've found have been twice the price. I am so very pleased!! I also took the recommendation from another reviewer and ordered the over sized King, and as she stated it fills the duvet completely. Very happy with my purchase, you can't go wrong ordering one!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Don't wanna get out of bed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like this needed one more review stating how comfy it is! But it is. I don't need a blanket I just snuggle, snuggle, snuggle in this. So very happy with this purchase. Once situated in my duvet I pinned the top corners cuz I don't know how else it won't shift. Maybe someone else knows. Just know I'm sleepin' and dreamin' all comfy cozy here in Michigan. -- Natural Comfort Soft and Luxurious 300TC Sateen White Down Alternative Duvet Insert, Queen.
customer_reviews.author: PamFabulous

customer_reviews.title: Quality Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter. It feels just like a real down comforter. I only will buy down if it is all down. I thought I would give the alternative down a try and I am impressed. I bought two for my boys since their comforters were getting thin. They said they were nice and warm and they think the comforter is very soft. The only thing I would do different is go up a size to the full. It would fit longer on the beds. I am going to see if I can get a king for my bed. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Comfortable, Soft, Luxurious, Cloud-like
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, comfortable, soft, luxurious, cloud-like. Those are just a few of the words I thought were fitting for this comforter. I purchased the oversized king size. I'm glad I chose this size, as a regular king may have been too small. The quality is top notch, on par if not better than most luxurious hotel chains. We love it. It keeps you warm without making you too hot. Great price, very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: WVUDave + Wife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great product. I may have purchased it at the wrong time of year, as I live in Phoenix where we run hot pretty much all year. I still recommend this to anybody, as you can't find the comfort and quality at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: not as oversized but love it!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is exactly what I was hoping for! It's nice and light weight enough for Southern California summer nights but add another blanket and it will be perfect for cooler temps as well. It's super fluffy and as the other reviews state, it came that way right out the box unlike others. The only thing I should mention is that it is definately not as "oversized" as the picture may seem but it does fit a pillow-top queen nicely - maybe 6-8" of overhang.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boye

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: First time ever buying a duvet insert (cover purchases separately)...love it. We were wanting fluffy and comfortable, something to snuggle into - this is great for a first-time, non-experienced duvet buyer. The only issue is that it seems a little too small for the cover we purchased, but by no means the fault of either seller - I should have paid better attention to measurements. The insert doesn't fill the cover entirely, and maybe it shouldn't. Anyway, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Best

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly zipped in a package with handles. Definitely saving that zippered-handled bag for storage in the spring/summer. This makes my sleep so soft, fluffy, and luxurious...so I guess you can say it's description is 100% accurate. Placing it in my duvet cover alone was a struggle. I suppose it would be easier with a second person to help out. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best comforters I have bought. I usually replace my down (alternative) comforter every two years. I never really splurge on them and figure it is just easier to buy a new one when they go on sale. However, the cost and quality of this one far surpasses any I have bought before. It is so fluffy and soft, I feel like I'l laying under a much more expensive blanket. I also really like the subtle stripes, they give it more of a polished look. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love this Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Natural Comfort Comforter. I purchased the Heavy one and we love it. It keeps us warm in this extremely cold weather (north east). I used a light one for summer and it also was perfect with having Central AC. I purchased the oversized one so I could be sure it would cover both my husband and I and still have extra covering on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: I recently got a Cal-king bed and will be purchasing this again in that size because it really is great for year round comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have had the oversize queen duvet for 3+ years and it is fabulous! I recently got a Cal-king bed and will be purchasing this again in that size because it really is great for year round comfort! I have washed and dried the duvet a few times with absolutely no issues. It has also held up its crisp white color the whole time. Excellent product for a great price point!!
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Even warmth and soft feel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oversized comforter! The best part is that when my wife does her cocoon thing, there is still enough blankets for me to cover up half my body (usually she rolls up in the blankets a couple of times and I wake up freezing cold without any blanket in the middle of the night). Thank you amazon for helping me sleep better!
customer_reviews.author: Honeybadger3891

customer_reviews.title: Best investment we made
customer_reviews.text: Best investment we made! It is very comfy and is just like the big ones at the hotel. After use it does need a good shake out to gain some fluff but I love this comforter. Just grab some covers for it and its a simple way to change the whole look of your room without having to have a different comforter that you don't like! LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent duvet insert
customer_reviews.text: Great Duvet insert. Lightweight, which is important for South Texas weather. Has corner ties, so no need to mess with clips. Fit my 108" x 92" duvet beautifully. Will probably buy another one to replace a larger one I have in another duvet without ties. If you're thinking about an extra-large duvet insert, this is a great one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: SueSee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and price
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Medium loft - soft and airy, fluffy but not enormous. Medium warmth and very comfortable indeed. I run hot and like to sleep a little cool - this is fine for me (in Florida with airconditioning!). I have allergies and I can breathe easy with this duvet. I use queen duvet covers and the fit is perfect. I am very happy with my purchase and look forward to going to bed more now!
customer_reviews.author: Lit_Chick

customer_reviews.title: It's lighter and thicker than actual down which was a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's lighter and thicker than actual down which was a change for me. Overall it's still a comfy blanket though. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: So soft & oversized!
customer_reviews.text: So happy there is an oversize option! The constant struggle of getting enough comforter on your side of the bed is gone. I haven't tried putting it in a normal duvet cover yet so we'll see how that goes. It is super soft & great weight. Haven’t had it for Texas summer though.
customer_reviews.author: Brit628

customer_reviews.title: great comforter
customer_reviews.text: i bought it as a gift for my daughter. She is always complaining that she gets cold easily. This kept her warm, during the NJ winters. great purchase, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A.

customer_reviews.title: Natural Comfort Soft and Luxurious 300TC Sateen White Down Alternative Duvet Insert, King
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a down alternative insert that was fluffy, but wasn't too heavy or too light. This one is perfect. I paired it with a Pottery Barn duvet cover and I love it! I have a tall, queen-size bed, but always buy king-size comforters because I like the hang over on the sides of the bed. It does get a little warm, but I just kick one leg out if I get too hot. I have been using this since June 2012, and as of this post it's still holding its shape and fluffiness.
customer_reviews.author: CrazEbean

customer_reviews.title: Nice Warm Comfortable Medium Thickness
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival was shipped in a huge box! Suprised at the sheer weight of item even though a medium thickness. Not too warm nor too thin thickness. If you live in a very cold climate you may want to go thicker. Close to perfect for Oklahoma chilly nights. Outside sateen in luxurious even though putting in a cover. Product of China. Pleased with the overall purchase. Super soft and a pleasure to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: TheHonestTruth

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a luxury bed!
customer_reviews.text: This down alternative comforter is fantastic, especially for the price. We had been needing to replace our down comforter for some time, so I decided to go less expensive and get this. My husband can't stop talking about it. For the first two weeks he kept saying, "This comforter is awesome. It feels like we're in a luxury hotel!"
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Super quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! It feels like down, fits inside my Restoration Hardware Cal-King linen duvet perfectly! Great price too! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a down comforter, but when I decided to get a new one my gut told me to go with this down alternative comforter. This comforter keeps me warm, without making me too hot (I live in the south- so it's always hot). It is soft and squishy and OVERSIZED! :) The only negative thing is that there is a little bunching in some places, but nothing too noticeable. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned down and alternative comforters for years ranging in price from $300 to $50. I ordered this one based on the many 4+ star reviews and the $65 price. I just put it in the duvet and was shocked to see that it completely filled out the cover! I ordered the oversized king and it is very full in size--fully covers the bed with a decent amount of overhang. As for loft/fill, it felt like a good weight as I inserted it and the box stitching looks fairly close together so I'm hoping it won't bunch up too badly as time goes on. For the price, I'm extremely satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Soft...and little warm maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Washed well. Didn't have any issues washing and drying in a front loading washer. Cons: Some guests are complaining that it's too warm. One complained that it was "too heavy on her feet". Personally, I thought it was comfortable, but I will concede that it is a little on the warmer side. We tend to keep our house at 70 year around.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaB

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable duvets
customer_reviews.text: This hypoallergenic duvet insert/comforter is extremely soft and comfortable! Feels like you're in a cloud. I've had it for about 5 years now and my only complaint is that the filling has started to bunch/clump in spots... That said, I didn't have a cover on it for years and was washing it frequently. No problem with my allergies. Great product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tstark09

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and OMG comfy
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you call this bed cover (duvet, comforter), it feels like heaven. So comfy and gorgeous. We love it. It DID shed initially and I did have to go over it entirely with a lint roller (used lots of lint tape), BUT, I loved it so much I was willing to do it. Oh, and the price!!!! $76 plus free shipping for an oversized King. This would be like $400 somewhere else. Thank you AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet insert for duvet cover bought at West Elm
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet insert. I bought the oversized king to fit inside a duvet cover I had purchased at West Elm. It fits great AND includes corner tie downs. It is just the right weight for all year use...nice and lofty and just the right weight. And very good price for the quality. What more could you want? Search no more.
customer_reviews.author: Dan's Review

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted less than two years
customer_reviews.text: This was a really nice duvet for two years, and then all the baffles started coming unstitched and the filling ended up on one end of the blanket. I have always used it gently and did not machine wash it, so the disintegration of the stitching was not due to abuse. I contacted the manufacturer and received no response. Great product for the price, but mine didn't last, and Natural Comfort didn't seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: onceinawhile

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: My old comforter was too heavy for someone going through the hot flash stages of life :( and my husband doesn't like to be warm either. This was a good solution. Not too heavy yet warm, plus I can change the duvet cover as frequently as the hot flashes require me too. good item at a good price. Meets my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Fill does not stay in baffles; lumpy blanket
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for almost a year, the blanket has gotten lumpy and the fill doesnt seem to stay in place in each baffle. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality! After usage of one year, many cotton/fiber slip out of it. Very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: qushu10

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I've had real down comforters most of my life, but after spending most of our budget on a new King size bed we were looking for something cost-effective, but still warm and fluffy. For the money, you can't do better than this. It's warm enough to keep us cozy during Pennsylvania winter nights, even though we turn the heat down to 60 when we go to bed. It looks nice enough that you don't need a duvet cover, although we do use a cover to keep it clean. It's a good buy, I'd purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: A

product_meta.title: Natural Comfort Soft and Luxurious 300TC Sateen White Down Alternative Duvet Insert, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:QueenCover yourself In Something Soft and Luxurious. 100-Percent Combed Cotton Ticking,100-Percent Poly Cluster Fiber Fill Down Alternative; Oversize Cal-King - 104-Inch by 98-Inch (89-Ounce);Oversize King - 108-Inch by 94-Inch (89-Ounce); King - 102-Inch by 90-Inch (76-Ounce);Oversize Queen - 92-Inch by 94-Inch (70 -Ounce); Queen - 86-Inch by 90-Inch (66-Ounce);Full - 82-Inch x86-Inch (61-Ounce);Twin - 64-Inch x86-Inch (52-Ounce).
